mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.member_no memberNo, m.title, m.poster, m.runtime FROM BOOKMARKS b, MOVIES m WHERE b.movie_no = m.no AND b.type = 'C' AND b.member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into bookmarks values(bookmarks_seq.nextval,(select member_no from c_list where no= #{memberNo}), #{movieNo},systimestamp,'C');
